about.title: About Us
about.introduction: We are revolutionizing healthcare through artificial intelligence, making medical advice more accessible and personalized than ever before.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We strive to make healthcare more accessible, efficient, and personalized through the power of artificial intelligence. Our platform connects patients with AI-enhanced medical advice, providing immediate, reliable, and confidential health support.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To revolutionize healthcare by making professional medical advice accessible to everyone, everywhere, and at any time. We envision a world where quality healthcare is just one click away.

items.innovation: Continuously pushing the boundaries of AI in healthcare
items.quality: Delivering accurate and reliable medical information
items.privacy: Ensuring the confidentiality of all medical data

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A diverse group of healthcare professionals, AI experts, and technology innovators working together to improve healthcare access and delivery.

technology.title: Our Technology
technology.description: Powered by advanced AI algorithms and machine learning, our platform provides intelligent, context-aware medical guidance while maintaining the highest standards of data security and privacy.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our service

0.question: What is {{agentName}}?
0.answer: {{agentName}} is an AI-powered medical assistant that provides instant, confidential health advice. Our platform uses advanced artificial intelligence to offer personalized medical guidance 24/7.

1.question: How does {{agentName}} work?
1.answer: Simply describe your symptoms or health concerns, and our AI doctor will provide immediate, professional medical advice. The system analyzes your input and generates responses based on medical knowledge and best practices.

2.question: Is {{agentName}} a replacement for real doctors?
2.answer: No, {{agentName}} is not a replacement for professional medical care. It's designed to provide initial guidance and information. Always consult with a healthcare professional for serious medical conditions or emergencies.

3.question: Is my information secure?
3.answer: Yes, we take your privacy seriously. All conversations are encrypted and confidential. We follow strict data protection protocols to ensure your health information remains secure.

4.question: Do I need to create an account?
4.answer: No, you can use {{agentName}} without creating an account. However, creating an account allows you to save your consultations and track your health history.

5.question: What kind of medical advice can I get?
5.answer: You can ask about symptoms, general health concerns, medication information, and lifestyle advice. However, {{agentName}} cannot diagnose serious conditions or prescribe medications.

6.question: Is the service available 24/7?
6.answer: Yes, {{agentName}} is available around the clock. You can get medical advice whenever you need it, without waiting for office hours.

7.question: How accurate is the medical advice?
7.answer: While {{agentName}} provides information based on medical knowledge and best practices, it's important to remember that it's not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always consult with a healthcare provider for serious concerns.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: We take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services. By using our platform, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.description: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services, including personal information such as your name, email address, and medical history. We also collect usage data to understand how you interact with our platform.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.description: We use the collected information to maintain and improve our services, enhance your user experience, communicate with you about updates and changes, and ensure the security of our platform.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Your data is encrypted and stored securely.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also request a copy of your data or withdraw your consent for data processing at any time.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@{{websiteName}}{{websiteTld}}

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to {{agentName}}. By using our services, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read these terms carefully before using our platform.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By using {{agentName}}, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms of Service.

services.title: Service Description
services.description: {{agentName}} is an AI-based medical advice platform. We provide general health information but are not a substitute for professional medical advice.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: You agree to provide accurate information and maintain the security of your account.

limitations.title: Service Limitations
limitations.description: Our service is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always consult with your doctor for serious medical conditions.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All platform content and functionality is the property of {{agentName}} and is protected by applicable laws.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: {{agentName}} is not liable for any damages resulting from the use of our services.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time and will notify users of any changes.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For questions about the Terms of Service, email terms@{{domain}}.

security.title: Security
security.introduction: At {{agentName}}, the security of your medical data is our top priority. This page outlines the comprehensive security measures we implement to protect your information.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We employ industry-leading encryption standards to protect your medical data. All information is encrypted both in transit and at rest using advanced encryption protocols.

encryption.title: Encryption Standards
encryption.description: We use AES-256 encryption for data at rest and TLS 1.3 for data in transit. Your sensitive medical information is protected by the same security standards used by leading healthcare institutions.

access.title: Access Control
access.description: We implement strict access controls and authentication measures to ensure only authorized users can access their information. Multi-factor authentication is available for enhanced security.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: Our platform adheres to international security standards and healthcare regulations to ensure the highest level of data protection and privacy compliance.

monitoring.title: 24/7 Monitoring
monitoring.description: Our security systems are monitored around the clock to detect and prevent unauthorized access attempts and ensure continuous protection of your data.

contact.title: Security Contact
contact.description: For security-related inquiries or to report security concerns, please contact our security team at security@{{domain}}.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Technical Support & Business Inquiries
contact.introduction: This contact page is for technical support, business inquiries, and advertising opportunities only. For medical advice or health-related questions, please use the chat feature on our homepage.

email.title: Email Us
email.description: For technical support, business cooperation, or advertising inquiries, please email us at:

support.title: Technical Support Hours
support.description: We aim to respond to all technical and business inquiries within 24 hours.

contact.note: For medical questions or health advice, please return to the homepage and use our AI chat service. For medical emergencies, contact your local emergency services immediately.

medicalNote.title: Looking for Medical Advice?
medicalNote.description: Please use our AI chat service on the homepage for any health-related questions. Our AI doctor is available 24/7 to assist you with medical inquiries.
